resources.string: You quit before completing the payment
The CVV is a 3-digit security code at the back of your card
Please try again or select an alternative payment option.

•	 Click on the Pay button to generate a payment request on your phone 
•	 Enter your %1$s PIN when prompted on your phone to complete the payment 
•	 You will get your receipt from %1$s and an SMS confirmation from Interswitch 
•	 Didn't get the prompt on your phone? Display payment instructions

•	 On your Equitel menu, select My Money and then select Eazzy Pay 
•	 Select Pay bill and select account 
•	 Enter:%1$s as the Business number 
•	 Enter %2$s as the Account Number 
•	 Enter the EXACT amount (%3$s) 
•	 Enter your Equitel M-Banking PIN 
•	 Confirm details and complete the transaction 
•	 Once you receive a confirmation SMS from Equitel, click on the Pay button below

•	 Go to the M-PESA menu on your phone 
•	 Select Lipa na M-PESA 
•	 Select PayBill Option 
•	 Enter Business Number:%1$s 
•	 Enter %2$s as the Account Number 
•	 Enter the EXACT amount (%3$s) 
•	 Enter your PIN and press OK to send 
•	 Complete your transaction on your phone
